name: Barstools Brawls & Banter
description:
This is one of the test levels from my Wandering Inn game, which is now on hold. Only the systems that were close to a releasable state were enabled so there are no recipes, guest factions, or random events.

Controller required! It's somewhat playable with keyboard, but specific keybinds for grabbing items from the cabinet are missing.

How to play:

  • Grab meals from the cabinet
  • Place meals on the bar
  • Open the inn
  • Serve guests
  • Close the inn
